divs: sighting details looks like a twinkling star, but to detail, as in shape it formed,as circle, but not complete circle like drawn. points as a star on christmas tree, like jewish star and staying all lighted up, but also flickering, like more code and changed colors a few times, from silver,white to light gold and green and blue and one time i see maybe glimpse,of red and only one time. then about 7:00 look as some thing shot out and left quick streak, like shooting star almost, but not really visible and bright and dissipated as it was, like it was not to be noticed, but dissipation, was more like to be invisible. seemed to move ever so slight to the left, but eyes have tendencys to play tricks on us and it is on course of may going distant, but it would have to move away as the naked eye could not tell it was moving. still way bigger than any star ever seen and to much detail ad the lights that stay on and the extra flicker and say twinkle, not so much as star twinkle as the detail to visible as in detail of lights. then seen similar like shooting star at 11:00 position and it dissipated not like shooting star and went further, but not a steak, like the fist one, was like a streak, but not like shooting stars.i was looking s,west- s,s,west toward south good year az. :state : i was in avondale and close to chandler,good year. the object looks about 1:00 in sky and horizon, i would say, as looking on a clock would be 12:00 and not up there with the stars. so maybe horizon? i left post on [links moved to fi section\cms\tg] < better detail story earlier as this happen 02\22\2012 at 1230am and until i stopped looking at 1:00 am or so. to cold and concrete and socks on,no shoes. oh building was over head of my view of this and i was lining up this star like, but not like a star, "detail to much" , and it stayed in line with top of square of bldg, but seemed it may have went distant, but still hug he and visible detail and morse code flash and then not but still brightness of flash and twinkle lights. was wanting to continue to watch, as for movement or change of some thing or dis pear or some thing, but i seen a good one 24 years ago, that answered me with out a doubt. so this to me, just unknown.
Summary: looks as if a hughe star, bigger and brighter than any star twinkeling and a circle form, as in if you had a jewish star on your chrismas tree and the lights stayed on bright, but distant and they would get brighter and apear to change from the silver .
